titles.title: Emergency Gasoline Assistance Act
Emergency Gasoline Assistance Act

To increase funding of the block grant to States for social services, to provide for the increased funding to be used to provide a gasoline subsidy to certain low-income individuals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Energy assistance for the poor and aged

bill.summary:
Emergency Gasoline Assistance Act - Increases funding for the social services block grant under title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act for FY2008 and 2009.
Requires the state to use such increased funding to provide a gasoline subsidy to assist individuals who are members of families with incomes that do not exceed 300% of the federal poverty line.
